SRP.Q: In 1961, what is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the line representing Rural Communities relative to Elderly Population?
SRP.A: In 1961, Rural Communities is {above} Elderly Population in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: On Rural Communities, what is the spatial relationship of the data point in 1963 relative to that in 1964 in terms of vertical (above/below) and horizontal (left/right) directions?
SRP.A: On Rural Communities, the data point in 1963 is {below} and to the {left} of the data point in 1964.

VPR.A: Rural Communities's technology adoption rate levels show a {exponential rising} trend.
